Welcome to django-kanboard's documentation!
===========================================

Django_kanboard provides a way to recursively copy existing kanboard projects into a kanboard instance.

It also provides an admin command to keep a trace of duplicable kanboard projects.

.. code-block:: bash

   $ python ./manage.py sync_project_templates
